Title: The Himalayas
Plot: The most massive mountain range on Earth supplies humanity with many remarkable gifts, from pets and perfumes to religion and rice. Beginning in Pakistan in winter, and journeying from West to East through the seasons, this film reveals that the Himalayas support a surprising variety of wildlife, from mountaineering monkeys, leopards and bizarre golden takin to snakes, spiders and golden eagles, while billions of people also rely on monsoon rain and glacial soil for food.
